scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c green,blue "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace client && npm run build --workspace server
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace client && npm run test --workspace server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace client && npm run lint --workspace server
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace client && npm run format --workspace server
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --workspace client && npm run format:check --workspace server
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace client && npm run clean --workspace server
